name: Passport Wedding Invitation (Deposit) - TROPICAL-003
description:
Got The Invite? offers custom Passport Wedding Invitations - they are replicas of genuine passports, and are the perfect invitation for your upcoming wedding - especially for those destination weddings!

You can order the style as pictured above or order a custom design to reflect your theme and personal style.

Passport invitations are available with your choice of 4 or 8 pages of information.

** This listing is for the deposit/design fee for your custom order ONLY - the remaining balance of your order will be due upon final approval of your digital proofs**

PRICING (Not including Shipping & Handling):
Package A: Boarding Pass Invitation Only - $2.50 each
Package B: Passport Invitation with 4 Inside Pages AND Boarding Pass Reply Card - $4.95 each
Package C: Passport Invitation with 8 Inside Pages AND Boarding Pass Reply Card - $6.95 each
Package D: Passport Invitation ONLY with 4 Inside Pages - $3.95
Package E: Passport Invitation ONLY with 8 Inside Pages - $5.95

Design Fee / Setup: INCLUDED

Additional Options:
Pearl Metallic Shine Invitation Envelopes: $0.75
Pearl Metallic Shine Reply Card Envelopes: $0.55

The above pricing includes all taxes, and there is no minimum order required.

DEPOSIT INFO:
Your $50 design/setup fee is included in the total cost of your invitations and includes:
- A custom-designed passport invitation
- Up to 2 revisions to your digital proofs via emailed PDF/JPEG
- Up to one printed sample

PRODUCTION TIME:
2-3 weeks
**Rush service (production time of 7 business days) available at an additional cost of $75.00 per order. Please note, our rush service does not include shipping times.

If you don’t see the exact style you are looking for, please email me for more information on a custom invitation order.
